trans-unit.source: Technical guide to the Cortana Analytics Solution Template for predictive maintenance in aerospace and other businesses | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Technical guide to the Cortana Analytics Solution Template for predictive maintenance in aerospace and other businesses | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: A technical guide to the Solution Template with Microsoft Cortana Analytics for predictive maintenance in aerospace, utilities, and transportation.
trans-unit.target: A technical guide to the Solution Template with Microsoft Cortana Analytics for predictive maintenance in aerospace, utilities, and transportation.

trans-unit.source: Technical guide to the Cortana Analytics Solution Template for predictive maintenance in aerospace and other businesses
trans-unit.target: Technical guide to the Cortana Analytics Solution Template for predictive maintenance in aerospace and other businesses

trans-unit.source: **Acknowledgements**
trans-unit.target: **Acknowledgements**

trans-unit.source: This article is authored by data scientists Yan Zhang, Gauher Shaheen, Fidan Boylu Uz and software engineer Dan Grecoe at Microsoft.
trans-unit.target: This article is authored by data scientists Yan Zhang, Gauher Shaheen, Fidan Boylu Uz and software engineer Dan Grecoe at Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: **Overview**
trans-unit.target: **Overview**

trans-unit.source: Solution Templates are designed to accelerate the process of building an
trans-unit.target: Solution Templates are designed to accelerate the process of building an

trans-unit.source: E2E demo on top of Cortana Analytics Suite.
trans-unit.target: E2E demo on top of Cortana Analytics Suite.

trans-unit.source: A deployed template will
trans-unit.target: A deployed template will

trans-unit.source: provision your subscription with necessary Cortana Analytics components
trans-unit.target: provision your subscription with necessary Cortana Analytics components

trans-unit.source: and build the relationships between them.
trans-unit.target: and build the relationships between them.

trans-unit.source: It also seeds the data pipeline with sample data generated from a data generator application which you will download and install on your local machine after you deploy the solution template.
trans-unit.target: It also seeds the data pipeline with sample data generated from a data generator application which you will download and install on your local machine after you deploy the solution template.

trans-unit.source: The data generated from the generator will hydrate the data pipeline and start generating machine learning predictions which can then be visualized on the Power BI dashboard.
trans-unit.target: The data generated from the generator will hydrate the data pipeline and start generating machine learning predictions which can then be visualized on the Power BI dashboard.

trans-unit.source: The deployment process will guide you through several steps to set up your solution credentials.
trans-unit.target: The deployment process will guide you through several steps to set up your solution credentials.

trans-unit.source: Make sure you record these credentials such as solution name, username, and password you provide during the deployment.
trans-unit.target: Make sure you record these credentials such as solution name, username, and password you provide during the deployment.

trans-unit.source: The goal of this document is to explain the reference architecture and
trans-unit.target: The goal of this document is to explain the reference architecture and

trans-unit.source: different components provisioned in your subscription as part of this
trans-unit.target: different components provisioned in your subscription as part of this

trans-unit.source: solution template.
trans-unit.target: solution template.

trans-unit.source: The document also talks about how to replace the
trans-unit.target: The document also talks about how to replace the

trans-unit.source: sample data with real data of your own to be able to see insights and
trans-unit.target: sample data with real data of your own to be able to see insights and

trans-unit.source: predictions from your own data.
trans-unit.target: predictions from your own data.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the document discusses the
trans-unit.target: Additionally, the document discusses the

trans-unit.source: parts of the Solution Template that would need to be modified if you
trans-unit.target: parts of the Solution Template that would need to be modified if you

trans-unit.source: wanted to customize the solution with your own data.
trans-unit.target: wanted to customize the solution with your own data.

trans-unit.source: Instructions on how
trans-unit.target: Instructions on how

trans-unit.source: to build the Power BI dashboard for this Solution Template are provided
trans-unit.target: to build the Power BI dashboard for this Solution Template are provided

trans-unit.source: at the end.
trans-unit.target: at the end.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.TIP] You can download and print a [PDF version of this document](http://download.microsoft.com/download/F/4/D/F4D7D208-D080-42ED-8813-6030D23329E9/cortana-analytics-technical-guide-predictive-maintenance.pdf).
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.TIP] You can download and print a [PDF version of this document](http://download.microsoft.com/download/F/4/D/F4D7D208-D080-42ED-8813-6030D23329E9/cortana-analytics-technical-guide-predictive-maintenance.pdf).

trans-unit.source: **Big picture**
trans-unit.target: **Big picture**

trans-unit.source: When the solution is deployed, various Azure services within Cortana Analytics Suite are activated (*i.e.* Event Hub, Stream Analytics, HDInsight, Data Factory, Machine Learning, *etc.*).
trans-unit.target: When the solution is deployed, various Azure services within Cortana Analytics Suite are activated (*i.e.* Event Hub, Stream Analytics, HDInsight, Data Factory, Machine Learning, *etc.*).

trans-unit.source: The architecture diagram above shows, at a high level, how the Predictive Maintenance for Aerospace Solution Template is constructed from end-to-end.
trans-unit.target: The architecture diagram above shows, at a high level, how the Predictive Maintenance for Aerospace Solution Template is constructed from end-to-end.

trans-unit.source: You will be able to investigate these services in the azure portal by clicking on them on the solution template diagram created with the deployment of the solution with the exception of HDInsight as this service is provisioned on demand when the related pipeline activities are required to run and deleted afterwards.
trans-unit.target: You will be able to investigate these services in the azure portal by clicking on them on the solution template diagram created with the deployment of the solution with the exception of HDInsight as this service is provisioned on demand when the related pipeline activities are required to run and deleted afterwards.

trans-unit.source: You can download a [full-size version of the diagram](http://download.microsoft.com/download/1/9/B/19B815F0-D1B0-4F67-AED3-A40544225FD1/ca-topologies-maintenance-prediction.png).
trans-unit.target: You can download a [full-size version of the diagram](http://download.microsoft.com/download/1/9/B/19B815F0-D1B0-4F67-AED3-A40544225FD1/ca-topologies-maintenance-prediction.png).

trans-unit.source: The following sections describe each piece.
trans-unit.target: The following sections describe each piece.

trans-unit.source: **Data source and ingestion**
trans-unit.target: **Data source and ingestion**

trans-unit.source: Synthetic data source
trans-unit.target: Synthetic data source

trans-unit.source: For this template the data source used is generated from a desktop application that you will download and run locally after successful deployment.
trans-unit.target: For this template the data source used is generated from a desktop application that you will download and run locally after successful deployment.

trans-unit.source: You will find the instructions to download and install this application in the properties bar when you select the first node called Predictive Maintenance Data Generator on the solution template diagram.
trans-unit.target: You will find the instructions to download and install this application in the properties bar when you select the first node called Predictive Maintenance Data Generator on the solution template diagram.

trans-unit.source: This application feeds the [Azure Event Hub](#azure-event-hub) service with data points, or events, that will be used in the rest of the solution flow.
trans-unit.target: This application feeds the [Azure Event Hub](#azure-event-hub) service with data points, or events, that will be used in the rest of the solution flow.

trans-unit.source: This data source is comprised of or derived from publicly available data from the [NASA data repository](http://ti.arc.nasa.gov/tech/dash/pcoe/prognostic-data-repository/) using the [Turbofan Engine Degradation Simulation Data Set](http://ti.arc.nasa.gov/tech/dash/pcoe/prognostic-data-repository/#turbofan).
trans-unit.target: This data source is comprised of or derived from publicly available data from the [NASA data repository](http://ti.arc.nasa.gov/tech/dash/pcoe/prognostic-data-repository/) using the [Turbofan Engine Degradation Simulation Data Set](http://ti.arc.nasa.gov/tech/dash/pcoe/prognostic-data-repository/#turbofan).

trans-unit.source: The event generation application will populate the Azure Event Hub only
trans-unit.target: The event generation application will populate the Azure Event Hub only

trans-unit.source: while it's executing on your computer.
trans-unit.target: while it's executing on your computer.

trans-unit.source: Azure event hub
trans-unit.target: Azure event hub

trans-unit.source: The [Azure Event Hub](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/event-hubs/) service is the recipient of the input provided by the Synthetic Data Source described above.
trans-unit.target: The [Azure Event Hub](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/event-hubs/) service is the recipient of the input provided by the Synthetic Data Source described above.

trans-unit.source: **Data preparation and analysis**
trans-unit.target: **Data preparation and analysis**

trans-unit.source: Azure Stream Analytics
trans-unit.target: Azure Stream Analytics

trans-unit.source: The [Azure Stream Analytics](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/stream-analytics/) service is used to provide near real-time analytics on the input stream from the [Azure Event Hub](#azure-event-hub) service and publish results onto a [Power BI](https://powerbi.microsoft.com) dashboard as well as archiving all raw incoming events to the [Azure Storage](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/storage/) service for later processing by the [Azure Data Factory](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/services/data-factory/) service.
trans-unit.target: The [Azure Stream Analytics](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/stream-analytics/) service is used to provide near real-time analytics on the input stream from the [Azure Event Hub](#azure-event-hub) service and publish results onto a [Power BI](https://powerbi.microsoft.com) dashboard as well as archiving all raw incoming events to the [Azure Storage](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/storage/) service for later processing by the [Azure Data Factory](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/services/data-factory/) service.

trans-unit.source: HD Insights custom aggregation
trans-unit.target: HD Insights custom aggregation

trans-unit.source: The Azure HD Insight service is used to run [Hive](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/bigdatasupport/archive/2013/11/11/get-started-with-hive-on-hdinsight.aspx) scripts (orchestrated by Azure Data Factory) to provide aggregations on the raw events that were archived using the Azure Stream Analytics service.
trans-unit.target: The Azure HD Insight service is used to run [Hive](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/bigdatasupport/archive/2013/11/11/get-started-with-hive-on-hdinsight.aspx) scripts (orchestrated by Azure Data Factory) to provide aggregations on the raw events that were archived using the Azure Stream Analytics service.

trans-unit.source: Azure Machine Learning
trans-unit.target: Azure Machine Learning

trans-unit.source: The [Azure Machine Learning](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/machine-learning/) service is used (orchestrated by Azure Data Factory) to make predictions on the remaining useful life (RUL) of a particular aircraft engine given the inputs received.
trans-unit.target: The [Azure Machine Learning](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/machine-learning/) service is used (orchestrated by Azure Data Factory) to make predictions on the remaining useful life (RUL) of a particular aircraft engine given the inputs received.

trans-unit.source: **Data publishing**
trans-unit.target: **Data publishing**

trans-unit.source: Azure SQL Database Service
trans-unit.target: Azure SQL Database Service

trans-unit.source: The [Azure SQL Database](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/sql-database/) service is used to store (managed by Azure Data Factory) the predictions received by the Azure Machine Learning service that will be consumed in the [Power BI](https://powerbi.microsoft.com) dashboard.
trans-unit.target: The [Azure SQL Database](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/sql-database/) service is used to store (managed by Azure Data Factory) the predictions received by the Azure Machine Learning service that will be consumed in the [Power BI](https://powerbi.microsoft.com) dashboard.

trans-unit.source: **Data consumption**
trans-unit.target: **Data consumption**

trans-unit.source: Power BI
trans-unit.target: Power BI

trans-unit.source: The [Power BI](https://powerbi.microsoft.com) service is used to show a dashboard that contains aggregations and alerts provided by the [Azure Stream Analytics](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/stream-analytics/) service as well as RUL predictions stored in [Azure SQL Database](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/sql-database/) that were produced using the [Azure Machine Learning](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/machine-learning/) service.
trans-unit.target: The [Power BI](https://powerbi.microsoft.com) service is used to show a dashboard that contains aggregations and alerts provided by the [Azure Stream Analytics](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/stream-analytics/) service as well as RUL predictions stored in [Azure SQL Database](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/sql-database/) that were produced using the [Azure Machine Learning](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/machine-learning/) service.

trans-unit.source: For Instructions on how to build the Power BI dashboard for this Solution Template, refer to the section below.
trans-unit.target: For Instructions on how to build the Power BI dashboard for this Solution Template, refer to the section below.

trans-unit.source: **How to bring in your own data**
trans-unit.target: **How to bring in your own data**

trans-unit.source: This section describes how to bring your own data to Azure, and what
trans-unit.target: This section describes how to bring your own data to Azure, and what

trans-unit.source: areas would require changes for the data you bring into this
trans-unit.target: areas would require changes for the data you bring into this

trans-unit.source: architecture.
trans-unit.target: architecture.

trans-unit.source: It's unlikely that any dataset you bring would match the dataset used by the [Turbofan Engine Degradation Simulation Data Set](http://ti.arc.nasa.gov/tech/dash/pcoe/prognostic-data-repository/#turbofan) used for this solution template.
trans-unit.target: It's unlikely that any dataset you bring would match the dataset used by the [Turbofan Engine Degradation Simulation Data Set](http://ti.arc.nasa.gov/tech/dash/pcoe/prognostic-data-repository/#turbofan) used for this solution template.

trans-unit.source: Understanding your data and the requirements will be crucial in how you modify this template to work with your own data.
trans-unit.target: Understanding your data and the requirements will be crucial in how you modify this template to work with your own data.

trans-unit.source: If this is your first exposure to the Azure Machine Learning service, you can get an introduction to it by using the example in [How to create your first experiment](machine-learning-create-experiment.md).
trans-unit.target: If this is your first exposure to the Azure Machine Learning service, you can get an introduction to it by using the example in [How to create your first experiment](machine-learning-create-experiment.md).

trans-unit.source: The following sections will discuss the sections of the template that
trans-unit.target: The following sections will discuss the sections of the template that

trans-unit.source: will require modifications when a new dataset is introduced.
trans-unit.target: will require modifications when a new dataset is introduced.

trans-unit.source: Azure Event Hub
trans-unit.target: Azure Event Hub

trans-unit.source: The Azure Event Hub service is very generic, such that data can be
trans-unit.target: The Azure Event Hub service is very generic, such that data can be

trans-unit.source: posted to the hub in either CSV or JSON format.
trans-unit.target: posted to the hub in either CSV or JSON format.

trans-unit.source: No special processing
trans-unit.target: No special processing

trans-unit.source: occurs in the Azure Event Hub, but it's important that you understand
trans-unit.target: occurs in the Azure Event Hub, but it's important that you understand

trans-unit.source: the data that's fed into it.
trans-unit.target: the data that's fed into it.

trans-unit.source: This document does not describe how to ingest your data, but you can
trans-unit.target: This document does not describe how to ingest your data, but you can

trans-unit.source: easily send events or data to an Azure Event Hub using the Event Hub
trans-unit.target: easily send events or data to an Azure Event Hub using the Event Hub

trans-unit.source: API's.
trans-unit.target: API's.

trans-unit.source: Azure Stream Analytics
trans-unit.target: Azure Stream Analytics

trans-unit.source: The Azure Stream Analytics service is used to provide near real-time
trans-unit.target: The Azure Stream Analytics service is used to provide near real-time

trans-unit.source: analytics by reading from data streams and outputting data to any number
trans-unit.target: analytics by reading from data streams and outputting data to any number

trans-unit.source: of sources.
trans-unit.target: of sources.

trans-unit.source: For the Predictive Maintenance for Aerospace Solution Template, the
trans-unit.target: For the Predictive Maintenance for Aerospace Solution Template, the

trans-unit.source: Azure Stream Analytics query consists of four sub-queries, each
trans-unit.target: Azure Stream Analytics query consists of four sub-queries, each

trans-unit.source: consuming events from the Azure Event Hub service, and having outputs to
trans-unit.target: consuming events from the Azure Event Hub service, and having outputs to

trans-unit.source: four distinct locations.
trans-unit.target: four distinct locations.

trans-unit.source: These outputs consist of three Power BI
trans-unit.target: These outputs consist of three Power BI

trans-unit.source: datasets and one Azure Storage location.
trans-unit.target: datasets and one Azure Storage location.

trans-unit.source: The Azure Stream Analytics query can be found by:
trans-unit.target: The Azure Stream Analytics query can be found by:

trans-unit.source: Logging into the Azure portal
trans-unit.target: Logging into the Azure portal

trans-unit.source: Locating the stream analytics jobs ![](media\cortana-analytics-technical-guide-predictive-maintenance\icon-stream-analytics.png) that were generated when the solution was deployed (*e.g.*, **maintenancesa02asapbi** and **maintenancesa02asablob** for the predictive maintenance solution)
trans-unit.target: Locating the stream analytics jobs ![](media\cortana-analytics-technical-guide-predictive-maintenance\icon-stream-analytics.png) that were generated when the solution was deployed (*e.g.*, **maintenancesa02asapbi** and **maintenancesa02asablob** for the predictive maintenance solution)

trans-unit.source: Selecting
trans-unit.target: Selecting

trans-unit.source: ***INPUTS*** to view the query input
trans-unit.target: ***INPUTS*** to view the query input

trans-unit.source: ***QUERY*** to view the query itself
trans-unit.target: ***QUERY*** to view the query itself

trans-unit.source: ***OUTPUTS*** to view the different outputs
trans-unit.target: ***OUTPUTS*** to view the different outputs

trans-unit.source: Information about Azure Stream Analytics query construction can be found in the [Stream Analytics Query Reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn834998.aspx) on MSDN.
trans-unit.target: Information about Azure Stream Analytics query construction can be found in the [Stream Analytics Query Reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn834998.aspx) on MSDN.

trans-unit.source: In this solution, the queries output three datasets with near real-time
trans-unit.target: In this solution, the queries output three datasets with near real-time

trans-unit.source: analytics information about the incoming data stream to a Power BI
trans-unit.target: analytics information about the incoming data stream to a Power BI

trans-unit.source: dashboard that's provided as part of this solution template.
trans-unit.target: dashboard that's provided as part of this solution template.

trans-unit.source: Because
trans-unit.target: Because

trans-unit.source: there's implicit knowledge about the incoming data format, these queries
trans-unit.target: there's implicit knowledge about the incoming data format, these queries

trans-unit.source: would need to be altered based on your data format.
trans-unit.target: would need to be altered based on your data format.

trans-unit.source: The query in the second stream analytics job **maintenancesa02asablob** simply outputs all [Event Hub](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/event-hubs/) events to [Azure Storage](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/storage/) and hence requires no alteration regardless of your data format as the full event information is streamed to storage.
trans-unit.target: The query in the second stream analytics job **maintenancesa02asablob** simply outputs all [Event Hub](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/event-hubs/) events to [Azure Storage](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/storage/) and hence requires no alteration regardless of your data format as the full event information is streamed to storage.

trans-unit.source: Azure Data Factory
trans-unit.target: Azure Data Factory

trans-unit.source: The [Azure Data Factory](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/services/data-factory/) service orchestrates the movement and processing of data.
trans-unit.target: The [Azure Data Factory](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/services/data-factory/) service orchestrates the movement and processing of data.

trans-unit.source: In the Predictive Maintenance for Aerospace Solution Template the data factory is made up of three [pipelines](../data-factory/data-factory-create-pipelines.md) that move and process the data using various technologies.
trans-unit.target: In the Predictive Maintenance for Aerospace Solution Template the data factory is made up of three [pipelines](../data-factory/data-factory-create-pipelines.md) that move and process the data using various technologies.

trans-unit.source: You can access your data factory by opening the the Data Factory node at the bottom of the solution template diagram created with the deployment of the solution.
trans-unit.target: You can access your data factory by opening the the Data Factory node at the bottom of the solution template diagram created with the deployment of the solution.

trans-unit.source: This will take you to the data factory on your Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: This will take you to the data factory on your Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: If you see errors under your datasets, you can ignore those as they are due to data factory being deployed before the data generator was started.
trans-unit.target: If you see errors under your datasets, you can ignore those as they are due to data factory being deployed before the data generator was started.

trans-unit.source: Those errors do not prevent your data factory from functioning.
trans-unit.target: Those errors do not prevent your data factory from functioning.

trans-unit.source: This section discusses the necessary [pipelines](../data-factory/data-factory-create-pipelines.md) and [activities](../data-factory/data-factory-create-pipelines.md) contained in the [Azure Data Factory](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/services/data-factory/).
trans-unit.target: This section discusses the necessary [pipelines](../data-factory/data-factory-create-pipelines.md) and [activities](../data-factory/data-factory-create-pipelines.md) contained in the [Azure Data Factory](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/services/data-factory/).

trans-unit.source: Below is the diagram view of the solution.
trans-unit.target: Below is the diagram view of the solution.

trans-unit.source: Two of the pipelines of this factory contain [Hive](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/bigdatasupport/archive/2013/11/11/get-started-with-hive-on-hdinsight.aspx) scripts that are used to partition and aggregate the data.
trans-unit.target: Two of the pipelines of this factory contain [Hive](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/bigdatasupport/archive/2013/11/11/get-started-with-hive-on-hdinsight.aspx) scripts that are used to partition and aggregate the data.

trans-unit.source: When noted, the scripts will be located in the [Azure Storage](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/storage/) account created during setup.
trans-unit.target: When noted, the scripts will be located in the [Azure Storage](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/storage/) account created during setup.

trans-unit.source: Their location will be: maintenancesascript\\\\script\\\\hive\\\\ (or https://[Your solution name].blob.core.windows.net/maintenancesascript).
trans-unit.target: Their location will be: maintenancesascript\\\\script\\\\hive\\\\ (or https://[Your solution name].blob.core.windows.net/maintenancesascript).

trans-unit.source: Similar to the [Azure Stream Analytics](#azure-stream-analytics-1) queries, the [Hive](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/bigdatasupport/archive/2013/11/11/get-started-with-hive-on-hdinsight.aspx) scripts have implicit knowledge about the incoming data format, these queries would need to be altered based on your data format and [feature engineering](machine-learning-feature-selection-and-engineering.md) requirements.
trans-unit.target: Similar to the [Azure Stream Analytics](#azure-stream-analytics-1) queries, the [Hive](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/bigdatasupport/archive/2013/11/11/get-started-with-hive-on-hdinsight.aspx) scripts have implicit knowledge about the incoming data format, these queries would need to be altered based on your data format and [feature engineering](machine-learning-feature-selection-and-engineering.md) requirements.

trans-unit.source: *AggregateFlightInfoPipeline*
trans-unit.target: *AggregateFlightInfoPipeline*

trans-unit.source: This [pipeline](../data-factory/data-factory-create-pipelines.md) contains a single activity - an [HDInsightHive](../data-factory/data-factory-hive-activity.md) activity using a [HDInsightLinkedService](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn893526.aspx) that runs a [Hive](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/bigdatasupport/archive/2013/11/11/get-started-with-hive-on-hdinsight.aspx) script to partition the data put in [Azure Storage](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/storage/) during the [Azure Stream Analytics](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/stream-analytics/) job.
trans-unit.target: This [pipeline](../data-factory/data-factory-create-pipelines.md) contains a single activity - an [HDInsightHive](../data-factory/data-factory-hive-activity.md) activity using a [HDInsightLinkedService](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn893526.aspx) that runs a [Hive](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/bigdatasupport/archive/2013/11/11/get-started-with-hive-on-hdinsight.aspx) script to partition the data put in [Azure Storage](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/storage/) during the [Azure Stream Analytics](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/stream-analytics/) job.

trans-unit.source: The [Hive](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/bigdatasupport/archive/2013/11/11/get-started-with-hive-on-hdinsight.aspx) script for this partitioning task is ***AggregateFlightInfo.hql***
trans-unit.target: The [Hive](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/bigdatasupport/archive/2013/11/11/get-started-with-hive-on-hdinsight.aspx) script for this partitioning task is ***AggregateFlightInfo.hql***

trans-unit.source: *MLScoringPipeline*
trans-unit.target: *MLScoringPipeline*

trans-unit.source: This [pipeline](../data-factory/data-factory-create-pipelines.md) contains several activities and whose end result is the scored predictions from the [Azure Machine Learning](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/machine-learning/) experiment associated with this solution template.
trans-unit.target: This [pipeline](../data-factory/data-factory-create-pipelines.md) contains several activities and whose end result is the scored predictions from the [Azure Machine Learning](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/machine-learning/) experiment associated with this solution template.

trans-unit.source: The activities contained in this are:
trans-unit.target: The activities contained in this are:

trans-unit.source: [HDInsightHive](../data-factory/data-factory-hive-activity.md) activity using an [HDInsightLinkedService](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn893526.aspx) that runs a [Hive](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/bigdatasupport/archive/2013/11/11/get-started-with-hive-on-hdinsight.aspx) script to perform aggregations and feature engineering necessary for the [Azure Machine Learning](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/machine-learning/) experiment.
trans-unit.target: [HDInsightHive](../data-factory/data-factory-hive-activity.md) activity using an [HDInsightLinkedService](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn893526.aspx) that runs a [Hive](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/bigdatasupport/archive/2013/11/11/get-started-with-hive-on-hdinsight.aspx) script to perform aggregations and feature engineering necessary for the [Azure Machine Learning](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/machine-learning/) experiment.

trans-unit.source: The [Hive](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/bigdatasupport/archive/2013/11/11/get-started-with-hive-on-hdinsight.aspx) script for this partitioning task is ***PrepareMLInput.hql***.
trans-unit.target: The [Hive](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/bigdatasupport/archive/2013/11/11/get-started-with-hive-on-hdinsight.aspx) script for this partitioning task is ***PrepareMLInput.hql***.

trans-unit.source: [Copy](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn835035.aspx) activity that moves the results from the [HDInsightHive](../data-factory/data-factory-hive-activity.md) activity to a single [Azure Storage](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/storage/) blob that can be access by the [AzureMLBatchScoring](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn894009.aspx) activity.
trans-unit.target: [Copy](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn835035.aspx) activity that moves the results from the [HDInsightHive](../data-factory/data-factory-hive-activity.md) activity to a single [Azure Storage](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/storage/) blob that can be access by the [AzureMLBatchScoring](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn894009.aspx) activity.

trans-unit.source: [AzureMLBatchScoring](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn894009.aspx) activity that calls the [Azure Machine Learning](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/machine-learning/) experiment which results in the results being put in a single [Azure Storage](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/storage/) blob.
trans-unit.target: [AzureMLBatchScoring](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn894009.aspx) activity that calls the [Azure Machine Learning](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/machine-learning/) experiment which results in the results being put in a single [Azure Storage](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/storage/) blob.

trans-unit.source: *CopyScoredResultPipeline*
trans-unit.target: *CopyScoredResultPipeline*

trans-unit.source: This [pipeline](../data-factory/data-factory-create-pipelines.md) contains a single activity - a [Copy](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn835035.aspx) activity that moves the results of the [Azure Machine Learning](#azure-machine-learning) experiment from the ***MLScoringPipeline*** to the [Azure SQL Database](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/sql-database/) that was provisioned as part of the solution template installation.
trans-unit.target: This [pipeline](../data-factory/data-factory-create-pipelines.md) contains a single activity - a [Copy](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn835035.aspx) activity that moves the results of the [Azure Machine Learning](#azure-machine-learning) experiment from the ***MLScoringPipeline*** to the [Azure SQL Database](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/sql-database/) that was provisioned as part of the solution template installation.

trans-unit.source: Azure Machine Learning
trans-unit.target: Azure Machine Learning

trans-unit.source: The [Azure Machine Learning](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/machine-learning/) experiment used for this solution template provides the Remaining Useful Life (RUL) of an aircraft engine.
trans-unit.target: The [Azure Machine Learning](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/machine-learning/) experiment used for this solution template provides the Remaining Useful Life (RUL) of an aircraft engine.

trans-unit.source: The experiment is specific to the data set consumed and therefore will require modification or replacement specific to the data that's brought in.
trans-unit.target: The experiment is specific to the data set consumed and therefore will require modification or replacement specific to the data that's brought in.

trans-unit.source: For information about how the Azure Machine Learning experiment was created, see [Predictive Maintenance: Step 1 of 3, data preparation and feature engineering](http://gallery.cortanaanalytics.com/Experiment/Predictive-Maintenance-Step-1-of-3-data-preparation-and-feature-engineering-2).
trans-unit.target: For information about how the Azure Machine Learning experiment was created, see [Predictive Maintenance: Step 1 of 3, data preparation and feature engineering](http://gallery.cortanaanalytics.com/Experiment/Predictive-Maintenance-Step-1-of-3-data-preparation-and-feature-engineering-2).

trans-unit.source: **Monitor Progress**
trans-unit.target: **Monitor Progress**

trans-unit.source: Once the Data Generator is launched, the pipeline begins to get hydrated and the different components of your solution start kicking into action following the commands issued by the Data Factory.
trans-unit.target: Once the Data Generator is launched, the pipeline begins to get hydrated and the different components of your solution start kicking into action following the commands issued by the Data Factory.

trans-unit.source: There are two ways you can monitor the pipeline.
trans-unit.target: There are two ways you can monitor the pipeline.

trans-unit.source: One of the Stream Analytics job writes the raw incoming data to blob storage.
trans-unit.target: One of the Stream Analytics job writes the raw incoming data to blob storage.

trans-unit.source: If you click on Blob Storage component of your solution from the screen you successfully deployed the solution and then click Open in the right panel, it will take you to the [management portal](https://portal.azure.com/).
trans-unit.target: If you click on Blob Storage component of your solution from the screen you successfully deployed the solution and then click Open in the right panel, it will take you to the [management portal](https://portal.azure.com/).

trans-unit.source: Once there, click on Blobs.
trans-unit.target: Once there, click on Blobs.

trans-unit.source: In the next panel, you will see a list of Containers.
trans-unit.target: In the next panel, you will see a list of Containers.

trans-unit.source: Click on **maintenancesadata**.
trans-unit.target: Click on **maintenancesadata**.

trans-unit.source: In the next panel, you will see the **rawdata** folder.
trans-unit.target: In the next panel, you will see the **rawdata** folder.

trans-unit.source: Inside the rawdata folder, you will see folders with names such as hour=17, hour=18 etc. If you see these folders, it indicates that the raw data is successfully being generated on your computer and stored in blob storage.
trans-unit.target: Inside the rawdata folder, you will see folders with names such as hour=17, hour=18 etc. If you see these folders, it indicates that the raw data is successfully being generated on your computer and stored in blob storage.

trans-unit.source: You should see csv files that should have finite sizes in MB in those folders.
trans-unit.target: You should see csv files that should have finite sizes in MB in those folders.

trans-unit.source: The last step of the pipeline is to write data (e.g. predictions from machine learning) into SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: The last step of the pipeline is to write data (e.g. predictions from machine learning) into SQL Database.

trans-unit.source: You might have to wait a maximum of three hours for the data to appear in SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: You might have to wait a maximum of three hours for the data to appear in SQL Database.

trans-unit.source: One way to monitor how much data is available in your SQL Database is through [azure portal](https://manage.windowsazure.com/).On the left panel locate SQL DATABASES ![](media\cortana-analytics-technical-guide-predictive-maintenance\icon-SQL-databases.png) and click it.
trans-unit.target: One way to monitor how much data is available in your SQL Database is through [azure portal](https://manage.windowsazure.com/).On the left panel locate SQL DATABASES ![](media\cortana-analytics-technical-guide-predictive-maintenance\icon-SQL-databases.png) and click it.

trans-unit.source: Then locate your database **pmaintenancedb** and click on it.
trans-unit.target: Then locate your database **pmaintenancedb** and click on it.

trans-unit.source: On the next page at the bottom, click on MANAGE
trans-unit.target: On the next page at the bottom, click on MANAGE

trans-unit.source: ![](media\cortana-analytics-technical-guide-predictive-maintenance\icon-manage.png).
trans-unit.target: ![](media\cortana-analytics-technical-guide-predictive-maintenance\icon-manage.png).

trans-unit.source: Here, you can click on New Query and query for the number of rows (e.g. select count(*) from PMResult ).
trans-unit.target: Here, you can click on New Query and query for the number of rows (e.g. select count(*) from PMResult ).

trans-unit.source: As your database grows, the number of rows in the table should increase.
trans-unit.target: As your database grows, the number of rows in the table should increase.

trans-unit.source: **Power BI Dashboard**
trans-unit.target: **Power BI Dashboard**

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: This section describes how to set up Power BI dashboard to visualize
trans-unit.target: This section describes how to set up Power BI dashboard to visualize

trans-unit.source: your real time data from Azure stream analytics (hot path), as well as
trans-unit.target: your real time data from Azure stream analytics (hot path), as well as

trans-unit.source: batch prediction results from Azure machine learning (cold path).
trans-unit.target: batch prediction results from Azure machine learning (cold path).

trans-unit.source: Setup cold path dashboard
trans-unit.target: Setup cold path dashboard

trans-unit.source: In the cold path data pipeline, the essential goal is to get the
trans-unit.target: In the cold path data pipeline, the essential goal is to get the

trans-unit.source: predictive RUL (remaining useful life) of each aircraft engine once it
trans-unit.target: predictive RUL (remaining useful life) of each aircraft engine once it

trans-unit.source: finishes a flight (cycle).
trans-unit.target: finishes a flight (cycle).

trans-unit.source: The prediction result is updated every 3
trans-unit.target: The prediction result is updated every 3

trans-unit.source: hours for predicting the aircraft engines that have finished a flight
trans-unit.target: hours for predicting the aircraft engines that have finished a flight

trans-unit.source: during the past 3 hours.
trans-unit.target: during the past 3 hours.

trans-unit.source: Power BI connects to an Azure SQL database as its data source, where the prediction results are stored.
trans-unit.target: Power BI connects to an Azure SQL database as its data source, where the prediction results are stored.

trans-unit.source: Note: 1) Upon deploying your solution, a real prediction will show up in the database within 3 hours.
trans-unit.target: Note: 1) Upon deploying your solution, a real prediction will show up in the database within 3 hours.

trans-unit.source: The pbix file that came with the Generator download contains some seed data so that you may create the Power BI dashboard right away.
trans-unit.target: The pbix file that came with the Generator download contains some seed data so that you may create the Power BI dashboard right away.

trans-unit.source: 2) In this step, the prerequisite is to download and install the free software [Power BI desktop](https://powerbi.microsoft.com/documentation/powerbi-desktop-get-the-desktop/).
trans-unit.target: 2) In this step, the prerequisite is to download and install the free software [Power BI desktop](https://powerbi.microsoft.com/documentation/powerbi-desktop-get-the-desktop/).

trans-unit.source: The following steps will guide you on how to connect the pbix file to the SQL Database that was spun up at the time of solution deployment containing data (*e.g.*.
trans-unit.target: The following steps will guide you on how to connect the pbix file to the SQL Database that was spun up at the time of solution deployment containing data (*e.g.*.

trans-unit.source: prediction results) for visualization.
trans-unit.target: prediction results) for visualization.

trans-unit.source: Get the database credentials.
trans-unit.target: Get the database credentials.

trans-unit.source: You'll need **database server name, database name, user name and password** before moving to next steps.
trans-unit.target: You'll need **database server name, database name, user name and password** before moving to next steps.

trans-unit.source: Here are the steps to guide you how to find them.
trans-unit.target: Here are the steps to guide you how to find them.

trans-unit.source: Once **'Azure SQL Database'** on your solution template diagram turns green, click it and then click **'Open'**.
trans-unit.target: Once **'Azure SQL Database'** on your solution template diagram turns green, click it and then click **'Open'**.

trans-unit.source: You'll see a new browser tab/window which displays the Azure portal page.
trans-unit.target: You'll see a new browser tab/window which displays the Azure portal page.

trans-unit.source: Click **'Resource groups'** on the left panel.
trans-unit.target: Click **'Resource groups'** on the left panel.

trans-unit.source: Select the subscription you're using for deploying the solution, and then select **'YourSolutionName\_ResourceGroup'**.
trans-unit.target: Select the subscription you're using for deploying the solution, and then select **'YourSolutionName\_ResourceGroup'**.

trans-unit.source: In the new pop out panel, click the ![](media\cortana-analytics-technical-guide-predictive-maintenance\icon-sql.png) icon to access your database.
trans-unit.target: In the new pop out panel, click the ![](media\cortana-analytics-technical-guide-predictive-maintenance\icon-sql.png) icon to access your database.

trans-unit.source: Your database name is next to the this icon (*e.g.*, **'pmaintenancedb'**), and the **database server name** is listed under the Server name property and should look similar to **YourSoutionName.database.windows.net**.
trans-unit.target: Your database name is next to the this icon (*e.g.*, **'pmaintenancedb'**), and the **database server name** is listed under the Server name property and should look similar to **YourSoutionName.database.windows.net**.

trans-unit.source: Your database **username** and **password** are the same as the username and password previously recorded during deployment of the solution.
trans-unit.target: Your database **username** and **password** are the same as the username and password previously recorded during deployment of the solution.

trans-unit.source: Update the data source of the cold path report file with Power BI Desktop.
trans-unit.target: Update the data source of the cold path report file with Power BI Desktop.

trans-unit.source: In the folder on your PC where you downloaded and unzipped the Generator file, double-click the **PowerBI\\PredictiveMaintenanceAerospace.pbix** file.
trans-unit.target: In the folder on your PC where you downloaded and unzipped the Generator file, double-click the **PowerBI\\PredictiveMaintenanceAerospace.pbix** file.

trans-unit.source: If you see any warning messages when you open the file, ignore them.
trans-unit.target: If you see any warning messages when you open the file, ignore them.

trans-unit.source: On the top of the file, click **'Edit Queries'**.
trans-unit.target: On the top of the file, click **'Edit Queries'**.

trans-unit.source: You'll see two tables, **RemainingUsefulLife** and **PMResult**.
trans-unit.target: You'll see two tables, **RemainingUsefulLife** and **PMResult**.

trans-unit.source: Select the first table and click ![](media\cortana-analytics-technical-guide-predictive-maintenance\icon-query-settings.png) next to **'Source'** under **'APPLIED STEPS'** on the right **'Query Settings'** panel.
trans-unit.target: Select the first table and click ![](media\cortana-analytics-technical-guide-predictive-maintenance\icon-query-settings.png) next to **'Source'** under **'APPLIED STEPS'** on the right **'Query Settings'** panel.

trans-unit.source: Ignore any warning messages that appear.
trans-unit.target: Ignore any warning messages that appear.

trans-unit.source: In the pop out window, replace **'Server'** and **'Database'** with your own server and database names, and then click **'OK'**.
trans-unit.target: In the pop out window, replace **'Server'** and **'Database'** with your own server and database names, and then click **'OK'**.

trans-unit.source: For server name, make sure you specify the port 1433 (**YourSoutionName.database.windows.net, 1433**).
trans-unit.target: For server name, make sure you specify the port 1433 (**YourSoutionName.database.windows.net, 1433**).

trans-unit.source: Leave the Database field as **pmaintenancedb**.
trans-unit.target: Leave the Database field as **pmaintenancedb**.

trans-unit.source: Ignore the warning messages that appear on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Ignore the warning messages that appear on the screen.

trans-unit.source: In the next pop out window, you'll see two options on the left pane (**Windows** and **Database**).
trans-unit.target: In the next pop out window, you'll see two options on the left pane (**Windows** and **Database**).

trans-unit.source: Click **'Database'**, fill in your **'Username'** and **'Password'** (this is the username and password you entered when you first deployed the solution and created an Azure SQL database).
trans-unit.target: Click **'Database'**, fill in your **'Username'** and **'Password'** (this is the username and password you entered when you first deployed the solution and created an Azure SQL database).

trans-unit.source: In ***Select which level to apply these settings to***, check database level option.
trans-unit.target: In ***Select which level to apply these settings to***, check database level option.

trans-unit.source: Then click **'Connect'**.
trans-unit.target: Then click **'Connect'**.

trans-unit.source: Click on the second table **PMResult** then click ![](media\cortana-analytics-technical-guide-predictive-maintenance\icon-navigation.png) next to **'Source'** under **'APPLIED STEPS'** on the right **'Query Settings'** panel, and update the server and database names as in the above steps and click OK.
trans-unit.target: Click on the second table **PMResult** then click ![](media\cortana-analytics-technical-guide-predictive-maintenance\icon-navigation.png) next to **'Source'** under **'APPLIED STEPS'** on the right **'Query Settings'** panel, and update the server and database names as in the above steps and click OK.

trans-unit.source: Once you're guided back to the previous page, close the window.
trans-unit.target: Once you're guided back to the previous page, close the window.

trans-unit.source: A message will pop out - click **Apply**.
trans-unit.target: A message will pop out - click **Apply**.

trans-unit.source: Lastly, click the **Save** button to save the changes.
trans-unit.target: Lastly, click the **Save** button to save the changes.

trans-unit.source: Your Power BI file has now established connection to the server.
trans-unit.target: Your Power BI file has now established connection to the server.

trans-unit.source: If your visualizations are empty, make sure you clear the selections on the visualizations to visualize all the data by clicking the eraser icon on the upper right corner of the legends.
trans-unit.target: If your visualizations are empty, make sure you clear the selections on the visualizations to visualize all the data by clicking the eraser icon on the upper right corner of the legends.

trans-unit.source: Use the refresh button to reflect new data on the visualizations.
trans-unit.target: Use the refresh button to reflect new data on the visualizations.

trans-unit.source: Initially, you will only see the seed data on your visualizations as the data factory is scheduled to refresh every 3 hours.
trans-unit.target: Initially, you will only see the seed data on your visualizations as the data factory is scheduled to refresh every 3 hours.

trans-unit.source: After 3 hours, you will see new predictions reflected in your visualizations when you refresh the data.
trans-unit.target: After 3 hours, you will see new predictions reflected in your visualizations when you refresh the data.

trans-unit.source: (Optional) Publish the cold path dashboard to [Power BI online](http://www.powerbi.com/).
trans-unit.target: (Optional) Publish the cold path dashboard to [Power BI online](http://www.powerbi.com/).

trans-unit.source: Note that this step needs a Power BI account (or Office 365 account).
trans-unit.target: Note that this step needs a Power BI account (or Office 365 account).

trans-unit.source: Click **'Publish'** and few seconds later a window appears displaying "Publishing to Power BI Success!"
trans-unit.target: Click **'Publish'** and few seconds later a window appears displaying "Publishing to Power BI Success!"

trans-unit.source: with a green check mark.
trans-unit.target: with a green check mark.

trans-unit.source: Click the link below "Open PredictiveMaintenanceAerospace.pbix in Power BI".
trans-unit.target: Click the link below "Open PredictiveMaintenanceAerospace.pbix in Power BI".

trans-unit.source: To find detailed instructions, see [Publish from Power BI Desktop](https://support.powerbi.com/knowledgebase/articles/461278-publish-from-power-bi-desktop).
trans-unit.target: To find detailed instructions, see [Publish from Power BI Desktop](https://support.powerbi.com/knowledgebase/articles/461278-publish-from-power-bi-desktop).

trans-unit.source: To create a new dashboard: click the **+** sign next to the **Dashboards** section on the left pane.
trans-unit.target: To create a new dashboard: click the **+** sign next to the **Dashboards** section on the left pane.

trans-unit.source: Enter the name "Predictive Maintenance Demo" for this new dashboard.
trans-unit.target: Enter the name "Predictive Maintenance Demo" for this new dashboard.

trans-unit.source: Once you open the report, click ![](media\cortana-analytics-technical-guide-predictive-maintenance\icon-pin.png) to pin all the visualizations to your dashboard.
trans-unit.target: Once you open the report, click ![](media\cortana-analytics-technical-guide-predictive-maintenance\icon-pin.png) to pin all the visualizations to your dashboard.

trans-unit.source: To find detailed instructions, see [Pin a tile to a Power BI dashboard from a report](https://support.powerbi.com/knowledgebase/articles/430323-pin-a-tile-to-a-power-bi-dashboard-from-a-report).
trans-unit.target: To find detailed instructions, see [Pin a tile to a Power BI dashboard from a report](https://support.powerbi.com/knowledgebase/articles/430323-pin-a-tile-to-a-power-bi-dashboard-from-a-report).

trans-unit.source: Go to the dashboard page and adjust the size and location of your visualizations and edit their titles.
trans-unit.target: Go to the dashboard page and adjust the size and location of your visualizations and edit their titles.

trans-unit.source: To find detailed instructions on how to edit your tiles, see [Edit a tile -- resize, move, rename, pin, delete, add hyperlink](https://powerbi.microsoft.com/documentation/powerbi-service-edit-a-tile-in-a-dashboard/#rename).
trans-unit.target: To find detailed instructions on how to edit your tiles, see [Edit a tile -- resize, move, rename, pin, delete, add hyperlink](https://powerbi.microsoft.com/documentation/powerbi-service-edit-a-tile-in-a-dashboard/#rename).

trans-unit.source: Here is an example dashboard with some cold path visualizations pinned to it.
trans-unit.target: Here is an example dashboard with some cold path visualizations pinned to it.

trans-unit.source: Depending on how long you run your data generator, your numbers on the visualizations may be different.
trans-unit.target: Depending on how long you run your data generator, your numbers on the visualizations may be different.

trans-unit.source: To schedule refresh of the data, hover your mouse over the **PredictiveMaintenanceAerospace** dataset, click ![](media\cortana-analytics-technical-guide-predictive-maintenance\icon-elipsis.png) and then choose **Schedule Refresh**.
trans-unit.target: To schedule refresh of the data, hover your mouse over the **PredictiveMaintenanceAerospace** dataset, click ![](media\cortana-analytics-technical-guide-predictive-maintenance\icon-elipsis.png) and then choose **Schedule Refresh**.

trans-unit.source: **Note:** If you see a warning massage, click **Edit Credentials** and make sure your database credentials are the same as those described in step 1.
trans-unit.target: **Note:** If you see a warning massage, click **Edit Credentials** and make sure your database credentials are the same as those described in step 1.

trans-unit.source: Expand the **Schedule Refresh** section.
trans-unit.target: Expand the **Schedule Refresh** section.

trans-unit.source: Turn on "keep your data up-to-date".
trans-unit.target: Turn on "keep your data up-to-date".

trans-unit.source: Schedule the refresh based on your needs.
trans-unit.target: Schedule the refresh based on your needs.

trans-unit.source: To find more information, see [Data refresh in Power BI](https://support.powerbi.com/knowledgebase/articles/474669-data-refresh-in-power-bi).
trans-unit.target: To find more information, see [Data refresh in Power BI](https://support.powerbi.com/knowledgebase/articles/474669-data-refresh-in-power-bi).

trans-unit.source: Setup hot path dashboard
trans-unit.target: Setup hot path dashboard

trans-unit.source: The following steps will guide you how to visualize real time data output from Stream Analytics jobs that were generated at the time of solution deployment.
trans-unit.target: The following steps will guide you how to visualize real time data output from Stream Analytics jobs that were generated at the time of solution deployment.

trans-unit.source: A [Power BI online](http://www.powerbi.com/) account is required to perform the following steps.
trans-unit.target: A [Power BI online](http://www.powerbi.com/) account is required to perform the following steps.

trans-unit.source: If you don't have an account, you can [create one](https://powerbi.microsoft.com/pricing).
trans-unit.target: If you don't have an account, you can [create one](https://powerbi.microsoft.com/pricing).

trans-unit.source: Add Power BI output in Azure Stream Analytics (ASA).
trans-unit.target: Add Power BI output in Azure Stream Analytics (ASA).

trans-unit.source: You will need to follow the instructions in [Azure Stream Analytics & Power BI: A real-time analytics dashboard for real-time visibility of streaming data](stream-analytics-power-bi-dashboard.md) to set up the output of your Azure Stream Analytics job as your Power BI dashboard.
trans-unit.target: You will need to follow the instructions in [Azure Stream Analytics & Power BI: A real-time analytics dashboard for real-time visibility of streaming data](stream-analytics-power-bi-dashboard.md) to set up the output of your Azure Stream Analytics job as your Power BI dashboard.

trans-unit.source: The ASA query has three outputs which are **aircraftmonitor**, **aircraftalert**, and **flightsbyhour**.
trans-unit.target: The ASA query has three outputs which are **aircraftmonitor**, **aircraftalert**, and **flightsbyhour**.

trans-unit.source: You can view the query by clicking on query tab.
trans-unit.target: You can view the query by clicking on query tab.

trans-unit.source: Corresponding to each of these tables, you will need to add an output to ASA.
trans-unit.target: Corresponding to each of these tables, you will need to add an output to ASA.

trans-unit.source: When you add the first output (*e.g.* **aircraftmonitor**) make sure the **Output Alias**, **Dataset Name** and **Table Name** are the same (**aircraftmonitor**).
trans-unit.target: When you add the first output (*e.g.* **aircraftmonitor**) make sure the **Output Alias**, **Dataset Name** and **Table Name** are the same (**aircraftmonitor**).

trans-unit.source: Repeat the steps to add outputs for **aircraftalert**, and **flightsbyhour**.
trans-unit.target: Repeat the steps to add outputs for **aircraftalert**, and **flightsbyhour**.

trans-unit.source: Once you have added all three output tables and started the ASA job, you should get a confirmation message (*e.g.*, "Starting stream analytics job maintenancesa02asapbi succeeded").
trans-unit.target: Once you have added all three output tables and started the ASA job, you should get a confirmation message (*e.g.*, "Starting stream analytics job maintenancesa02asapbi succeeded").

trans-unit.source: Log in to [Power BI online](http://www.powerbi.com)
trans-unit.target: Log in to [Power BI online](http://www.powerbi.com)

trans-unit.source: On the left panel Datasets section in My Workspace, the ***DATASET*** names **aircraftmonitor**, **aircraftalert**, and **flightsbyhour** should appear.This is the streaming data you pushed from Azure Stream Analytics in the previous step.The dataset **flightsbyhour** may not show up at the same time as the other two datasets due to the nature of the SQL query behind it.
trans-unit.target: On the left panel Datasets section in My Workspace, the ***DATASET*** names **aircraftmonitor**, **aircraftalert**, and **flightsbyhour** should appear.This is the streaming data you pushed from Azure Stream Analytics in the previous step.The dataset **flightsbyhour** may not show up at the same time as the other two datasets due to the nature of the SQL query behind it.

trans-unit.source: However, it should show up after an hour.
trans-unit.target: However, it should show up after an hour.

trans-unit.source: Make sure the ***Visualizations*** pane is open and is shown on the right side of the screen.
trans-unit.target: Make sure the ***Visualizations*** pane is open and is shown on the right side of the screen.

trans-unit.source: Once you have the data flowing into Power BI, you can start visualizing the streaming data.
trans-unit.target: Once you have the data flowing into Power BI, you can start visualizing the streaming data.

trans-unit.source: Below is an example dashboard with some hot path visualizations pinned to it.
trans-unit.target: Below is an example dashboard with some hot path visualizations pinned to it.

trans-unit.source: You can create other dashboard tiles based on appropriate datasets.
trans-unit.target: You can create other dashboard tiles based on appropriate datasets.

trans-unit.source: Depending on how long you run your data generator, your numbers on the visualizations may be different.
trans-unit.target: Depending on how long you run your data generator, your numbers on the visualizations may be different.

trans-unit.source: Here are some steps to create one of the tiles above the "Fleet View of Sensor 11 vs. Threshold 48.26" tile:
trans-unit.target: Here are some steps to create one of the tiles above the "Fleet View of Sensor 11 vs. Threshold 48.26" tile:

trans-unit.source: Click dataset **aircraftmonitor** on the left panel Datasets section.
trans-unit.target: Click dataset **aircraftmonitor** on the left panel Datasets section.

trans-unit.source: Click the **Line Chart** icon.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Line Chart** icon.

trans-unit.source: Click **Processed** in the **Fields** pane so that it shows under "Axis" in the **Visualizations** pane.
trans-unit.target: Click **Processed** in the **Fields** pane so that it shows under "Axis" in the **Visualizations** pane.

trans-unit.source: Click "s11" and "s11\_alert" so that they both appear under "Values".
trans-unit.target: Click "s11" and "s11\_alert" so that they both appear under "Values".

trans-unit.source: Click the small arrow next to **s11** and **s11\_alert**, change "Sum" to "Average".
trans-unit.target: Click the small arrow next to **s11** and **s11\_alert**, change "Sum" to "Average".

trans-unit.source: Click **SAVE** on the top and name the report "aircraftmonitor".
trans-unit.target: Click **SAVE** on the top and name the report "aircraftmonitor".

trans-unit.source: The report named "aircraftmonitor" will be shown in the **Reports** section in the **Navigator** pane on the left.
trans-unit.target: The report named "aircraftmonitor" will be shown in the **Reports** section in the **Navigator** pane on the left.

trans-unit.source: Click the **Pin Visual** icon on the top right corner of this line chart.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Pin Visual** icon on the top right corner of this line chart.

trans-unit.source: A "Pin to Dashboard" window may show up for you to choose a dashboard.
trans-unit.target: A "Pin to Dashboard" window may show up for you to choose a dashboard.

trans-unit.source: Select "Predictive Maintenance Demo", then click "Pin".
trans-unit.target: Select "Predictive Maintenance Demo", then click "Pin".

trans-unit.source: Hover the mouse over this tile on the dashboard, click the "edit" icon on the top right corner to change its title to "Fleet View of Sensor 11 vs. Threshold 48.26" and subtitle to "Average across fleet over time".
trans-unit.target: Hover the mouse over this tile on the dashboard, click the "edit" icon on the top right corner to change its title to "Fleet View of Sensor 11 vs. Threshold 48.26" and subtitle to "Average across fleet over time".

trans-unit.source: **How to delete your solution**
trans-unit.target: **How to delete your solution**

trans-unit.source: Please ensure that you stop the data generator when not actively using the solution as running the data generator will incur higher costs.
trans-unit.target: Please ensure that you stop the data generator when not actively using the solution as running the data generator will incur higher costs.

trans-unit.source: Please delete the solution if you are not using it.
trans-unit.target: Please delete the solution if you are not using it.

trans-unit.source: Deleting your solution will delete all the components provisioned in your subscription when you deployed the solution.
trans-unit.target: Deleting your solution will delete all the components provisioned in your subscription when you deployed the solution.

trans-unit.source: To delete the solution right click on your solution name in the left panel of the solution template and click on delete.
trans-unit.target: To delete the solution right click on your solution name in the left panel of the solution template and click on delete.

trans-unit.target: total costs involved in running the Predictive Maintenance for Aerospace
